name: The F.I.R.S.T. School
description: Recording Arts and Film & Video School
overview:
History: Florida Institute of Recording Arts and Sound Technology

The Florida Institute of Recording, Sound and Technology (F.I.R.S.T.) was established in 2004. During this time much thought and effort went into how the F.I.R.S.T. School would teach and inspire students in the Digital Media field. The following year the F.I.R.S.T. School launched its first program in Audio Engineering and Music Production. Due to the success of the first program and the growing need for employment in the Digital Media field, the Film and Video Production program was launched. F.I.R.S.T. School programs were built on the philosophy of providing exceptional training and employable skills in the field of Digital Media. The F.I.R.S.T. School is located at 2309 Silver Star Road, Orlando FL 32804.

Vision Statement

Our vision is to ensure the highest quality education and learning experience to our students.

Mission Statement

Our mission is to prepare students for a successful career in the field of Digital Media. The F.I.R.S.T. School is dedicated to its hands-on experience, learning philosophy and continual advancement in technology.

Occupational Goals and Philosophy

Digital Media is a very exciting, growing and competitive field for those who have the right blend of drive, talent and skill. The F.I.R.S.T. School believes that it can make a huge difference in student development. Every lesson plan is based on the objectives faced by professionals in this field on a daily basis.
